title: "What is the significance of Nicolas Flamel's alchemy in sexual energy enhancement and consciousness maintenance?"
first_phrase: The last section of this text delves into the use of symbols to transform oneself and achieve transcendence. The preceding text explains that symbols are pervasive and operate on multiple levels simultaneously. They are not just physical representations but also function as tools of control over actions. The section then lists specific exercises to help individuals become aware of and vivify symbols, focusing on the vertical symbol E and its relationship to sexual energy and the spinal column. The text also references historical figures such as alchemist Nicolas Flamel and philosopher Raimondo Lullo.

Lo sviluppo della verticale e dell’energia E Il simbolo E del Nitro rappresenta un segno verticale all’interno del cerchio F. Il riferimento concerne l’energia, soprattutto quella sessuale, e la colonna vertebrale 1 . Le chiavi per lo sviluppo di questo sono sia la posizione verticale che lo sviluppo dell’energia sessuale. La schiena e la colonna vertebrale sono essenziali per un corretto sviluppo dell’energia. Meditare su questo simbolo significa dedicare attenzione all’energia verticale. last_phrase: In conclusion, the fundamental principles of Franz Anton Mesmer's original therapy, based on the three philosophical ingredients of salts, have been outlined through a series of exercises aimed at developing and harmonizing the energy of the body. By focusing on the symbols and energies associated with the salts, individuals can gain a deeper understanding of themselves and their connection to the world around them, leading to a sense of well-being and expanded consciousness. Through disciplined practice and attention to one's own body and energy, anyone can integrate these powerful philosophies into their daily life and experience the transformative power of the three salts.
